snippet: A famous face can attract donations and recognition a nonprofit group, but public figures can also behave in ways that harm a cause.
abstract: Celebrities can be helpful in drawing attention to a charity, often attracting donations, but at times nonprofit organizations can harm their cause if they link themselves to a public figure with a tumultuous personal life or career, or with someone who turns out not to be very committed.
lead_paragraph: A famous face can attract donations and recognition a nonprofit group, but public figures can also behave in ways that harm a cause.

headline.main: Stars Offer Rewards and Risks to Charities
headline.print_headline: Stars Offer Rewards and Risks to Charities
